title.rendered: Official University of South Africa Prospectus 2025 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The University of South Africa consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and course information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • School fees/tuition
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • University of South Africa admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at the University of South Africa based on the information provided within it.

Note: The University of South Africa’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives more detailed information about your application.

University of South Africa Prospectus 2025

The University of South Africa   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.unisa.ac.za/.

University of South Africa PROSPECTUS 2025 – PDF DOWNLOAD
